Summary - Solid background knowledge of relational database techniques including table creation, SQL Queries, client server application development 
 
- Setup multiple QA departments from the ground up in small startup companies putting process and procedures in place to systematically test multiple product lines. 
 
- Excellent working/testing experience with relational database management systems, including PC LAN and Oracle Client/Server environments 
 
- Created web based test case relational database using dynamic html for the Quality Assurance team to store and execute test cases and record results for build statistics.  
 
- Installed, configured and customized the Bugzilla Bug Tracking System (Apache Web Server, Perl CGI Scripts & MySQL backend) on Linux for the QA team. 
 
- Developed automation scripting tools & automation frameworks in Python & Perl to extract data from the schema for reporting and analysis 
 
- Automated and adhoc testing of web-based database application (MindIt Service) that would detect changes in web page content 
 
- Authored chapter on SQL techniques in the book, “dBASE 5.0 for Windows Unleashed” 
 
- Created hundreds of scripts using Selenium v1.0 and v2.0 Web Driver technologies. 
 
Specialties: software quality assurance, QA, database application programming, client/server relational database apps, Paradox DOS, Paradox for Windows relational database, ObjectPAL, SQL, Perl, Python, Delphi, Internet web database applications, networking, problem solving, consulting.
